full_summary:
### Facility Management Services for the Embassy of Canada to Saudi Arabia
#### Tender Number: 21-184605; Amendment Number 1

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) seeks a contractor to provide on-site facility management and project management services for the Embassy of Canada to Saudi Arabia, located in Riyadh. 

#### Key Services
* On-site facility management and maintenance of all office, representational, and utility spaces, recreational facilities, and lobbies at the Chancery, Official Residence, and Staff Quarters.
* Project management services for the upkeep and maintenance of the Embassy's property portfolio.

#### Contract Details
* Contract Period: 1 October 2023 to 30 September 2028.
* Tender Closing Date: Monday 28 August 2023 at 14:00:00.
* Expected Contract Start Date: 1 October 2023.
* Tender Status: Expired.
* Based on the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS), this tender is classified under:
	+ 72100000: Building and facility maintenance and repair services
	+ 72101500: Building maintenance and repair services
	+ 72102302: Plumbing system maintenance or repair
	+ 72101510: Air conditioning installation, maintenance, or repair service
	+ 72102304: Heating systems installation, repair, or maintenance

#### Eligibility and Selection Criteria
* Bidders must meet the selection criteria of the tender, which is based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
* Trade Agreements: The tender is open to bidders from countries that have a trade agreement with Canada.

#### Contact Information
* Name: Eric Rainville
* Email: [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca)
* Phone: 134357-27269

#### Documents
* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7764/21-184605---rfp.pdf

#### Notice Website

#### Language
* English and French.
